author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
The left has got some nerve claiming they were all in it to protect Democracy, despite creating the most undemocratic election in American history. So, while it’s not surprising that a former Biden aide has now admitted to doing just that, this is still a scandal that should never be forgotten.

To cover up the fact that Biden was a sleeping potato, his aides vowed to do whatever it takes, despite if it meant resorting to undemocratic means.


🇺🇸BIDEN AIDES CONFESS: THEY DID UNDEMOCRATIC THINGS TO STOP TRUMP?!

A longtime Biden aide admitted the staff bent the rules because they thought Trump was too dangerous for democracy.

They saw Biden as a figurehead, someone who just had to wave now and then while they made the…
title: Former Biden Aides Admitted To Doing “Undemocratic Things” To Stop Trump

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
While the Biden Administration did everything it could to “recommend” the jab to the masses, so much so that this experimental injection, with zero long-term studies, was on the CDC list for children and pregnant women, it is no longer recommended by our bureaucratic health authorities.

So, in other words, despite there being no evidence to recommend the shot for children both inside and outside the womb, America is slowly becoming healthier again. That is because this current administration is guided by science, not “the science.”

Secretary Robert F. Kennedy, Jr. has announced that the COVID-19 vaccine is no longer on the CDC's immunization schedule for healthy children and pregnant women.


Today, the COVID vaccine for healthy children and heal
title: RFK Jr makes a major change with the COVID vaccines that is long overdue

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
According to Kamala Harris, the reason some people enjoy looking at Playboy is because “they were developed for the perpetuation of the human species.”


Kamala Harris reemerges in Australia with disturbing, nonsensical monologue | Charlie Spiering, Daily Mail

Kamala Harris left an audience baffled as she laughed and talked about Playboy magazine covers.

The former vice president also launched into a confusing 'word salad' after… pic.twitter.com/YLUhTqv3vp
— Owen Gregorian (@OwenGregorian) May 27, 2025
title: Failed Presidential Candidate Kamala Harris Tosses Her Latest Word Salad: “...developed for the perpetuation of the human species”

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
The problem with words like “equity” is that it places guilt on a large majority of the population because of nothing more than insignificant birth traits. This, combined with asinine phrases intended to mislead the masses and drastically change society, has only alienated much of the sane population.

This is why many party members are now begging the Dems to stop using words and phrases like "oligarchs" and "justice-involved populations.”


Democrats are still looking for words that work.

Now Dems are blaming the cause for not having a message on their words being too “professorized?”

The problem isn't their words it's their policies! pic.twitter.com/ZXmSE8h8lJ
— Rep. Wesley Hunt Press Offi
title: Some Democrats argue against using woke words to alienate voters, but others claim those voters need to be alienated

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
The Democrats cannot seem to figure out why they fail to appeal to the male population. Subsequently, they have decided to spend millions of dollars to get to the bottom of this. Today’s show breaks down why the left crashes with young men and their pathetic plan to fix this.

“Young men tend to become more conservative as they grow older — as they have families, as they pay taxes, as they get more responsibility. But if you can just mitigate your losses to people under the age of 30 to 10 percent, and keep everything else the same, we would never lose an election again,” Crowder said. “I didn’t think you would see that big of a switch.”
title: Watch: The Left is Crashing Out with Young Men & Their Plan to Fix it is Stupid

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Despite national efforts to make biology a reality again, many states, including California, have not received that memo. This is why Trump said what needed to be said.

Trump has threatened to cut federal funding to the Golden State if officials don’t get their act together and make sports sane again, as a trans track athlete has been allowed to dominate the women’s division and plans to attend CIF finals this weekend.

High school junior AB Hernandez is a trans track athlete. Or, in other words, he’s a man. It’s unclear if he would have been capable of fairly competing against those with the same chromosomes as him, but you do the math. Nonetheless, she (he) had previously vowed to stick to the haters by stealing titles away from girls who
title: California ignored Donald Trump's EO to protect girls' sports against trans boys, so now POTUS is getting directly involved

author: Brodigan
description:
George Floyd - the man, the myth, the Fentanyl addict. We remember…or pay tribute to those who remember. That is to say: mercilessly mock the tributes that flooded in for a serial criminal whose death from a drug overdose set off the Black Lives Matter riots in 2020. The Democrats don’t know how to talk to men, so they are spending a lot of money to try to understand. President Donald Trump goes up against Tim Cook at Apple.


WATCH & REACT:

  • "We are proud to celebrate Africa Day"
title: Sources: Why The Left is Crashing with Young Men & The Stupid Plan to Fix It

author: Brodigan
description:
We all knew the "now it can be told" books about Joe Biden's OBVIOUS cognitive decline since before he ran for president were going to be maddening. Seeing journalismers go from the Biden cover-up being right-wing fan fiction to bigger than Watergate still makes you want to flip tables... and now we get the predictable pivot to making it about being anti-Trump and what HE might be covering up.

Let's start with the Watergate comparison, which, for the sake of argument, was President Richard Nixon's scandal being the mastermind behind a break-in at Democrat HQ (I know that you know that I know that you know). As it turns out, according to Jake Tapper, not knowing who was running the country for four years mayhaps be a bigger scandal.

This is an entirely separate scandal. Maybe even worse … maybe even worse than Watergate in s
title: "Original Sin" authors claim Biden health coverup worse than Watergate... but of course, now comes their anti-Trump pivot

author: Brodigan
description:
While the boys were out this weekend playing beer bong, crushing Busch Apples, and telling girls on the beach they were venture capitalists, Democrats were devising a plan to study dudes and attempt to figure out why the fellas think Democrats suck so hard. They're going to spend $20 million to learn that a top reason why they lost the male vote is that they think they need to spend $20 million to learn why they lost the male vote.

The Life of Julia is going to become The Life of Chad.

Apparently, choosing Tim Walz as a running mate because they felt he would give white dudes "permission" to vote for a woman of color was a mistake. Now they want to try an
title: Democrats have $20 million dollar plan to study why dudes think Democrats suck so hard, and the GOP may never lose again
